feature_name: Teacher can see project specific links

user_story.i_want: I should see project specific links

whens_list: I am on getting started page
thens_list: I should not see a project link labeled "Foo Project Link"
I should not see a project link labeled "Bar Project Link"

givens_list: the "teacher" user is added to the default project
whens_list: I am on getting started page
thens_list: I should see a project link labeled "Foo Project Link" linking to "http://foo.com"
I should see a project link labeled "Bar Project Link" linking to "http://bar.com"
